title: The New Job Interview Dilemma: How Much to Study a Hiring Manager’s Social Media
sub_head: Is it strategic—or risky—to bone up on your interviewer’s Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram accounts to glean talking points? We asked career experts to weigh in
body:
The Fixer is a monthly tech column that responds to reader queries about navigating the digital landscape and solving problems with gear.
Q: I have a job interview soon and am tempted to madly research the hiring manager online in case I can unearth details about her to use to my advantage when we talk. Bad idea?
